cards.buttonText: PITCH IN TO OUR TIP JAR

sections: In the new episode of our  weekly podcast
, David Sirota sits down with Rep. Ro Khanna (D-Calif.) for a substantive conversation on the latest congressional developments (9:16).

First, they discuss Ro‚Äôs ongoing House Oversight Committee investigation into fossil-fueled disinformation campaigns. The two also cover the U.S. airline industry debacle, the debate around banning gas stoves, and the recent votes for House Speaker ‚Äî and why progressives have yet to wield the same power as right-wing Republicans.
A rough transcript of the episode is available
If you like this episode, feel free to pitch into the tip jar ‚Äî it helps us do this kind of reporting:
